subject: Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: The pulses quicken for every self-respecting soccer star hoping to play in next year’s World Cup finals in South Africa. Time is running out on all continents, but in Asia particularly, this is a week when some countries could qualify and some will be eliminated from the 2010 tournament.
